TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The tumor is 7 centimeters or smaller and is found in the kidney only. Also called stage I renal cell cancer.

Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de riñón en estadio I"

Stage I kidney cancer; drawing shows cancer in the left kidney and the tumor is 7 centimeters or smaller. An inset shows 7 centimeters is about the size of a peach. Also shown are fatty tissue and the right kidney.
MediaLink.Caption: Stage I kidney cancer. The tumor is 7 centimeters or smaller and is found in the kidney only.
